content:
AI isn’t just dreams (and fears) about tomorrow’s technology … it’s being used right now, and much more broadly than you may realise. One more reason to care about what kind of AI is under the hood and how it’s being used:
https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2021/05/everyday-services-rely-on-artificial-intelligence-ai/

10 surprising things that rely on artificial intelligence
From filtering out spam emails to helping trains run on time, AI is all around us.
